description.brief: Control package for the Nao humanoid robot.

package.description: Control package for the Nao robot, providing basic odometry and movement messages. Makes Nao move accordinge to the MotionCommand topic. The most-current version is compatible with the Nao API version 1.6 or newer, connecting to a real or simulated Nao. To include NaoQI for controlling the robot, the "lib" directory of the Aldebaran SDK needs to be in your PYTHONPATH environment variable.
package.author: Armin Hornung, Stefan Osswald, Daniel Maier
